entities.label: Case 3/OO/27079-04 - Interception of French Ambassador's Communications

edges.label: 1. Conducted Interception
edges.tooltip: NSA intercepted communications of the French Ambassador.

edges.label: 2. Identity of Ambassador
edges.tooltip: Jean-David Levitte is the French Ambassador whose communications were intercepted.

edges.label: 3. Planned Exposure
edges.tooltip: Jean-David Levitte planned to expose alleged U.S. firm involvement to the U.S. Congress.

edges.label: 4. Alleged Profiteering
edges.tooltip: Allegations that U.S. firms profited from the UN Oil-for-food program.

edges.label: 5. Report Criticism
edges.tooltip: The Iraq Survey Group report named French companies, leading to criticism from the French Ambassador.

Jean-David Levitte: Allegation that French companies acted as subsidiaries of U.S. firms, benefiting from the UN Oil-for-food program.
